episodes.title: With Apologies to Jesse Jackson
episodes.plot: Stan becomes a social outcast after his father Randy says "the N-Word" on national television, but Michael Richards and Mark Furhman come to Randy's rescue.

episodes.title: Cartman Sucks
episodes.plot: Cartman takes a photo with Butters' penis in his mouth to prove Butters is gay. He later finds out what the picture really means and freaks out when the photo disappears. Meanwhile, Butters has to go to a special camp to calm his urges.

episodes.title: Lice Capades
episodes.plot: A lice outbreak hits Ms. Garrison's class, and at least one parasite is determined to survive after his lice civilization is destroyed.

episodes.title: The Snuke
episodes.plot: While trying to find a way to persecute the new Arab kid in his class, Cartman accidentally uncovers an unrelated plot to assassinate Hillary Clinton at a South Park political rally.

episodes.title: Fantastic Easter Special
episodes.plot: In a parody of "The daVinci Code," Stan discovers the real reason behind Easter, decorating eggs, and the Easter Bunny.

episodes.title: D-Yikes!
episodes.plot: Ms. Garrison's latest date goes so badly that she assigns the class the book report over the weekend, but the boys hire immigrant labor to write it. Meanwhile, Ms. Garrison becomes a lesbian and saves the women's bar from a Persian takeover.

episodes.title: Night of the Living Homeless
episodes.plot: One day after Kyle gives $20 to a homeless person, South Park becomes overrun with panhandlers.

episodes.title: Le Petit Tourette
episodes.plot: Cartman fakes having Tourette's syndrome so he can say whatever he wants, but faking the condition begins to wear on his mental filter.

episodes.title: More Crap
episodes.plot: Randy Marsh sets the world record for the biggest bowel movement, until Bono comes along and challenges it.

episodes.title: Imaginationland
episodes.plot: Terrorists attack Imaginationland, in an attempt to take over peoples' imagination; Kyle refuses to follow through with his promise to suck Cartman's balls.

episodes.title: Imaginationland: Episode II
episodes.plot: With the help of Stan and Kyle, the military is able to access the portal to Imaginationland; Cartman goes to great lengths to get Kyle to suck his balls after the leprechaun bet.

episodes.title: Imaginationland: Episode III
episodes.plot: Stan and Butters engage in battle as they fight the army of evil imaginary forces; Cartman once again goes to great lengths to get Kyle to suck his balls.

episodes.title: Guitar Queer-o
episodes.plot: Stan and Kyle become local celebrities after they score 100,000 points on the video game "Guitar Hero." A talent agent signs them to a contract, which ends up ruining their friendship.

episodes.title: The List
episodes.plot: The girls in the fourth grade class have made a secret list that rates every boy's looks from cutest to ugliest. When the boys steal the list, they are completely unprepared to deal with the results.
